domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @KamalaHarris One wonders how long he expected to “hide” the highly contagious coronavirus. How long did he think that could last? I guess not counting the sick and the dead helps hiding along, but what about the bodies? Just another symptom of his mental illnesses.
